title: I hear about some war coming to M&G and I'm like

replies.body:
https://66.media.tumblr.com/876d2bde78a79f5b58f0cd11e89fd5ec/tumblr_mmxw77P7yF1s50n3qo1_500.gif

We go to war because someone insulted Laughing Fish.
No, we go to war, because a lot of people insulted Laughing Fish. Majorily Aquilous and me.
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/thehungergamesrp/images/b/b0/Harry-potter-who-are-you.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150615000238

You mean we go to war because he insults me, then you guys defend me, then he insults you guys on top of insulting thee before hand. 

Rip.

When you say it like that it sounds like I am valiant. 

NOT  MY IDEA OF BEING HADES! That said, I like your version better.
I fight because laughing fish brought the gameplay scourge here.

It's true... He violated our sanctuary...
https://media.giphy.com/media/12NG3RS9LwHHOM/giphy.gif

So someone insulted laughing fish and now we are fighting them?
So who's fighting who, and how? Are we just spamming people or is there some tournament or something?
I'm not sure how it works yet but there will be war and  there will be bloodshed and there will be memes.
You may reconsider the bloodshed
Wait, there's a war going on? I didn't get the memo! O_o
Do you not remember my prior offer? You had claimed that an alt exists for thee on NA, Teemo.

Boss, you're gonna like this I think, (unless he comments again)

I beat fish In the first duel

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qqGX8Qrg,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T22:56:01.902+0000)
>
> No Honour...
> 
> You left your followers for almost a week and then disappear again
> 
> They listen and love you, and in return, you spat and abandoned them
> 
> You dare talk of Honour
> 
> Learn to exercise it Deserter


It's from that weird news post

Fact: You, Hades, Glory in Death, King Ordarth, and Airman Compsci have a combined total of 38.6k upvotes. That is less then I had when I did my *first* upvote spectacular, and less than a 3rd of my total now. I also have the top 3 posts in memes and games history. Now, you can go on your pretend war if you like, and if playing makes you feel big go for it. But until you actually bring something, *anything* to the table, I would hardly call this a war. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/IOCXHPvn3WErm/giphy.gif

>  I also have the top 3 posts in memes and games history.

Yeah, by bribing people with skins and upvote farming. I mean, if you are proud for upvote farming and in most cases paying people off for upvoting, then okay. Congratulations.

Those threads only made about 1.5k upvotes. Now, I realize that compared to 6.3k that is a lot, but I have over 120k left even without those threads. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/veL6DyCLYL3Fu/giphy.gif

This is about more than Upvotes

Sea boy

This is a matter of public view and opinion, you may be the so called Deemed Lord of The Board

Yet this is just a start... So keep laughing, keeping thinking you have control...

Because... Everything big, started from somewhere small

And we have just begun to grow
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/disneycreate/images/e/e0/Thats_adorable.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140525010947

American Revolution 

The Russian Revolution

Many Others...

I consider this a challenge... And one I shan't back away from 

Now, don't you have some Overwatch to be playing... You said you were enjoying it more than LoL

Of course sweetie. Now run along and enjoy your little "rebellion".

https://67.media.tumblr.com/3d90d7dc83126de919a8ee7bdfbfcc2d/tumblr_nwnb5jRdsh1u7nlyno1_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Airman CompSci,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QILUPWlf,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-07-12T20:59:57.557+0000)
>
> Do you not remember my prior offer? You had claimed that an alt exists for thee on NA, Teemo.

So THAT what it was... Thought I was just gonna join some dark cult that would take me hours to realize to just then by the time I do, I'm already nailed to the floor and used as sacrifice for the gods of darkness that demand League Saltyness...

...

...

...

...

Yeah, I still have my NA account, Trying to decide if I should focus on leveling up yordles, which is my game goal or spend a day at NA under massive lag and God knows what else...
You are fine then. Since Airman offered a position for you, I can wave you through.
You are EUW, its an NA army

> [{quoted}](name=HadesThomas,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QILUPWlf,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-07-12T20:17:30.382+0000)
>
> You are EUW, its an NA army

Fair enough. Does that mean I'm not part of this war if it's NA only? Or do I have to be part of it for partaking in M&G?

Hmmm
You won't be able to join the battles in the rift, but if you choose to partake in M&G you are welcome.

Ehm, I chose cookies, so where do I stand on the sideline?
I had to, because servers - also, because when I read about the factions, I was like:
Laughing Fish - oh...him.
Airman Odarth - ...who?
Cookies - Yummy!

Is there a set seating-arrangement for the neutral parties? I'd like to be seated near the dragons.
_And with that, referring to a part of the book [War Crimes](https://www.amazon.com/World-Warcraft-Crimes-Christie-Golden/dp/074347130X) here..._

So how will the battle go?

[http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/infinity-wars/images/1/1f/Warcry.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140915024441](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/infinity-wars/images/1/1f/Warcry.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140915024441)

http://images.memes.com/meme/405654

Or

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1439060010/DSC_0610.jpg

[_With respect_](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/vI7b3QTX-got-married-some-months-ago-this-was-my-cake-topper).

http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lymppbwxVc1qe4wxi.jpg

??

Ah, but you see - there were no "neutral" options in that poll! "Cookies" is simply a second option for Airman Odarth!

By the way: Airman Odarth is the couple name for Airman CompSci and King Odarth

>Airman Odarth is the couple name for Airman CompSci and King Odarth

I guess this one's on me for my apparent lack on knowledge, but I am none the wiser.
Okay, so I guess that's the actual nicknames of couple other (pun intended) players, but I have no idea who any of them are. 
Of those few, I only am aware of the Fish - which for some reason I am starting to worry is a good thing or not (or that could be because my brain's demanding a recharge now, and have seriously throttled down for the day, making even the simplest thing hard to process).

If they are all Memes and Games (M&G) celebrities, then I blame it on my server (or my current GPS-coordinates) for not being closer, thus more active on these Boards.

> [{quoted}](name=HadesThomas,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QILUPWlf,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T20:28:49.311+0000)
>
> Hmmm
> You won't be able to join the battles in the rift, but if you choose to partake in M&G you are welcome.

I guess...
Well, I guess it is going to divide Memes & Games too. The reason is that there are people who want a just Meme Queen instead of LF the egoistical.

Fact: You, Aqualious18, Glory in Death, King Ordarth, and Airman Compsci have a combined total of 38.6k upvotes. That is less then I had when I did my *first* upvote spectacular, and less than a 3rd of my total now. I also have the top 3 posts in memes and games history. Now, you can go on your pretend war if you like, and if playing makes you feel big go for it. But until you actually bring something, *anything* to the table, I would hardly call this a war.
https://media.giphy.com/media/IOCXHPvn3WErm/giphy.gif

yeah, but I we are a lot of persons, some with a fresh view. You are spamming memes, 
And I am going to try for most downvotes, because I have an idea that I like to try out. See what people think.
It's Memes & Games, why not? Rejoice, young civilian! War always boosts the economy - you can expect a plethora of memes, gifs, and puns in the near future for your eyes to feast upon!
It is human nature. Join me at the sidelines and laugh at the fools. I have popcorn.
Because it is the only way.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/cf7weQ-qiIY/hqdefault.jpg

It must stop before this happens.
Never!! Proceed with the cannons.
